definition: unable to conceal one's happiness, amazement, shock etc/grinning from ear to ear/mouth agape/gobsmacked
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
variant of 合[he2]
(negative prefix)/not/no
to gather together/to collect/to approach/to draw near to/to add/to sum up/to comb (hair)
mouth/beak/nozzle/spout (of teapot etc)/CL:張|张[zhang1],個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: "Good idea. She'll smile from ear to ear. "(
sentences.chinese: 好主意，她一定会笑得合不拢嘴。

sentences.english: Lately all the pictures of Hillary have her smiling from ear to ear.
sentences.chinese: 最近希拉里在所有的照片里都笑得合不拢嘴。

sentences.english: Getting a little grandson this year, my husband's aunt is so happy that she smiled all day long.
sentences.chinese: 叔婆今年添了个小孙孙，高兴得整日合不拢嘴。

sentences.english: Try our sweet corn, and you'll smile from ear to ear.
sentences.chinese: 尝尝我们的甜玉米，包你乐得合不拢嘴。

sentences.english: Wow, you are smiling from ear to ear.
sentences.chinese: 哇，你笑得都合不拢嘴啊。

sentences.english: Xiaotu listened, smiling all of the 1930.
sentences.chinese: 小兔听了，笑得都合不拢嘴了。

sentences.english: Ann: Wow, you are smiling from ear to ear.
sentences.chinese: 哇，你笑得都合不拢嘴啊。

definition: grinning from ear to ear (idiom)/beaming with happiness
overjoyed (idiom); as pleased as punch
to sway to and fro/to rock back and forth
unable to contain one's joy (idiom)
brows raised in delight, eyes laughing (idiom); beaming with joy/all smiles
unable to contain one's joy (idiom)
to burst with joy (idiom)/to be over the moon/to be elated
smile spread across the face (idiom); beaming with pleasure/all smiles/joy written across one's face
to burst with joy
happily/giddily
face light up with delight (idiom); to beam with joy
to be pleased beyond one's expectations (idiom)/overjoyed at the turn of events
to rock one's body backward and forward/to be convulsed (with laughter etc)
hands dance and feet trip (idiom); dancing and gesticulating for joy
smiles of exultation/radiant with delight
to be wild with joy (idiom)
